author: Rob Braxman Tech
description:
The EU is currently pushing the EU Chat Control legislation which has majority support. And the UK already passed the UK Online Safety Act last year. Though you think these are European initiatives, you will be surprised to know that all these actually impact us all, and they will impact us permanently. It will mean the absolute elimination of privacy and State control of all communications, if we do not speak out. Once again they invoke the "CSAM" banner to justify what is in fact the biggest overreach in the history of digital communications.

title: Kill Privacy Forever! They Will Mandate an App to Watch You! Client Side Scanning
